title: Hogwarts Legacy
description: Hogwarts Legacy is an upcoming action role-playing video game set in the Harry Potter universe, developed by Portkey Games and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. The game is set in the late 1800s and allows players to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as a student, explore the wizarding world, learn spells, brew potions, and battle magical creatures.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: F1 23
description: F1 23 is an upcoming racing video game developed and published by Codemasters. It is the twenty-third installment in the Formula One series, serving as the sequel to F1 2022. The game features all the official teams, drivers, and circuits from the 2023 Formula One World Championship season, including new tracks and updated regulations.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an action role-playing video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the twelfth major installment and the twenty-second release in the Assassin's Creed series, and a successor to the 2018 game Assassin's Creed Odyssey. Set in 873 AD, the game recounts a fictional story during the Viking invasion of Britain. The player controls Eivor, a Viking raider who becomes embroiled in the conflict between the Brotherhood of Assassins and the Templar Order.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: Watch Dogs 3
description: Watch Dogs 3 is an upcoming action-adventure video game developed and published by Ubisoft. Set in a fictionalized version of London, the game follows a hacker who uses their skills to take down a corrupt surveillance state. Players can explore the open world, hack various electronic devices, and engage in stealth and combat encounters.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: Far Cry 5
description: Far Cry 5 is an action-adventure first-person shooter game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. Set in the fictional Hope County, Montana, the game follows the story of a sheriff's deputy who becomes trapped in a violent conflict between a doomsday cult known as Eden's Gate and the residents of Hope County. Players must liberate the county from the cult's influence by recruiting allies, destroying cult property, and confronting the cult's leaders.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Breakpoint
description: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Breakpoint is a tactical shooter video game developed by Ubisoft Paris and published by Ubisoft. It is the eleventh installment in the Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon franchise and a narrative sequel to 2017's Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands. Set on the fictional archipelago of Auroa, players assume the role of a Ghost, a special operations soldier, tasked with investigating and neutralizing a rogue group of former Ghosts known as the Wolves.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure video game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the seventh main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series and follows the story of three criminals who plan and execute a series of heists in the fictional state of San Andreas. The game features an open world environment and allows players to explore the city of Los Santos and the surrounding countryside.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: NBA 2K24
description: NBA 2K24 is an upcoming basketball simulation video game developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports. It is the latest installment in the NBA 2K series and features updated graphics, gameplay mechanics, and game modes. Players can create their own custom basketball player and compete in various leagues, tournaments, and online matches.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an action-adventure video game developed and published by Rockstar Games. It is the prequel to 2010's Red Dead Redemption and follows the story of outlaw Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang as they rob, steal, and fight their way across the American West in 1899. The game features an open world environment and allows players to explore the Wild West on horseback, engage in shootouts, and interact with various characters.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: FIFA 24
description: FIFA 24 is an upcoming football simulation video game developed and published by Electronic Arts. It is the latest installment in the FIFA series, featuring updated graphics, gameplay mechanics, and game modes. Players can compete in various leagues, tournaments, and online matches with their favorite teams and players from around the world.
platform: Xbox One  Xbox Series X | S

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an action role-playing video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the twelfth major installment and the twenty-second release in the Assassin's Creed series. Set in 873 AD, the game recounts a fictional story during the Viking invasion of Britain. Players control Eivor, a Viking raider, as they lead their clan to settle in England, engaging in combat, exploration, and political alliances along the way.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
description: Spider-Man: Miles Morales is an action-adventure game developed by Insomniac Games. Players assume the role of Miles Morales as he becomes the new Spider-Man and must save his home, Harlem, from various threats while learning to master his newfound abilities. The game features thrilling web-swinging mechanics, fast-paced combat, and a heartfelt story.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: God of War Ragnarok
description: God of War Ragnarok is an upcoming action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. It serves as a sequel to God of War (2018), continuing the story of Kratos and his son Atreus as they confront Norse gods and monsters. The game promises intense combat, epic boss battles, and a rich, mythological narrative.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Ghost of Tsushima is an action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions. Set on Tsushima Island during the first Mongol invasion of Japan, players control Jin Sakai, a samurai warrior, in his quest to protect his people from the Mongol invaders. The game features a vast open world, stunning visuals, and immersive combat mechanics inspired by samurai cinema.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
description: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End is an action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog. Following treasure hunter Nathan Drake, players embark on an adventure to find a lost pirate treasure, navigating through perilous landscapes and facing formidable enemies. The game features breathtaking visuals, cinematic storytelling, and thrilling action sequences.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: The Last of Us Part II is an action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog. Set in a post-apocalyptic world, the game follows Ellie, who seeks revenge against a mysterious group in Seattle. Players navigate through dangerous environments, facing hostile humans and mutated creatures. The game explores themes of survival, morality, and redemption.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North. Set in the fictional state of San Andreas, players assume the roles of three criminals and their efforts to commit heists while under pressure from a government agency. The game offers an expansive open world, diverse gameplay opportunities, and a satirical take on American culture.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Breakpoint
description: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Breakpoint is a tactical shooter game developed by Ubisoft Paris. Set in an open world environment, players control a special forces operator navigating through a fictional island controlled by a rogue group of former military operatives. The game emphasizes stealth, survival, and strategic combat.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: FIFA 24
description: FIFA 24 is an upcoming football simulation video game developed and published by EA Sports. As the latest installment in the FIFA series, it features updated graphics, gameplay mechanics, and game modes. Players can enjoy various modes including career mode, ultimate team, and Volta football, competing with their favorite teams and players from around the world.
platform: PS4 PS5

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is a Western-themed action-adventure game developed by Rockstar Games. Set in an open world environment, players assume the role of outlaw Arthur Morgan as he navigates through the end of the Wild West era. The game features a gripping narrative, immersive gameplay mechanics, and a vast, living world full of opportunities and dangers.
platform: PS4 PS5
